endpoints.description: Create a new licensing agreement for digital content.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific licensing agreement.
Update details of an existing licensing agreement.
Delete an expired or invalid licensing agreement.
Retrieve a list of managed digital content.
Fetch details about a specific piece of digital content.
Allocate specified digital content to a distribution channel.
Generate a report on digital content usage statistics.
Generate a detailed royalty distribution report per licensing agreement.
Check the operational status of the service API.
